aanduwa wisuruwa hara maha mathiwaranayak pawathwimata janapathi gath thiranaya abhiyogayata lak karamin eksath jathika peramuna niyojanaya karana paksha kihipayak menma janatha wimukthi peramunada,demala sandhanayada adhikaranayata giyeya.parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harimata janapathi gath thiranaya wyawasthawata ekangada nadda yanna pilibanda elambaena 07 dina adhikaranaya magin thinduwak laba dimata niyamithaya.janapathi pathkala agamathi waraya pramukha aanduwata parlimenthuwa thula bahutharayak nomathi bawin owunta ema thanathuru darimata nithyanukula ayithiyak nomathi bawata abhiyachana adhikaranayata pethsam dekak magin idiripath kara thibune kathanayakawaraya ha mahacharya sarath wijesuriya mahathaya.parlimenthuwa thula wishwasabhanga yojanawak sammatha kara thibiyadi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha agamathi dhuraye katayuthu karana bawa pethsamkara parshwa penwa di thibu athara eya salakillata gena mahinda rajapaksha mahathata agamathi dhurayeth kabinat amathya,rajya amathya ha niyojya amathya dhurawala katayuthu karana hathalis nawa denakuta ema dhura darimath thawakalikawa walakwalamin abhiyachana adhikaranaya athuru thahanam niyogayak nikuth kaleya.abhiyachana adhikaranaya labadun ema thinduwata ekanga nowana bawa dakwa aandu pakshaya mewana wita shreshtadhikaranayata abhiyachanayak gonukara thibe.siyalla wishleshanaya kirimedi peni yanne pasugiya masayaka kalaya rate awadhanaya yomuwu menma ratata balapannawu thindu thirana ganu labuwe adhikaranaya wisin bawayi.adhikaranaya magin labadun mema thindu hethuwen ithihasaye prathama wathawata me wanawita rate aanduwak nomathi thaththwayak nirmanaya wi thibe.

me athara maththala, rajapaksha jathyanthara guwanthotupalehi wanija guwan sewa, guwan yana nadaththuwa, aluthwadiyawa, piyasara pasal pamanak nowa ehi meheyum, kalamanakaranaya, nadaththuwa ha sanwardhanaya yana ansha kerehida awadhanaya yomu karamin hawul wyaparayak aarambha kirima pinisa indiyanu rajaya wisin yojanawak idiripath karanu laba thibe.

namuth rate awasanawakata rajaya, janatha wimukthi peramuna, shri lanka nidahas pakshaya ho eekabaddha wipakshaya nesbi samiwarayage prakashaya kisidu aakarayakata sakachchawakata bhajanaya kale natha. aar. sambandhange kandayama owunge pradhanama chodanawa maha begalayak bawa helidaraw wima sambandhayen nihanda piliwethak anugamanaya kirima pudumayak nowe.
